Package socialmedia

Class Account

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Account extends Object implements Serializable
Account class representing an account on the SocialMediaPlatform. Has two constructors, one for supplying both a description and a handle and the other for just a handle. The identifier is linearly generated as to be unique. Also provides functionality for managing account's posts within the platform.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account(String handle, String description)
      Constructs a new account instance with a pre-defined handle and account description

      Assumes the given handle has already been verified as unique by SocialMedia Assumes the description provided has already been validated

      Parameters:
      handle - the handle to be used for the account
      description - the String to set as the account's description

    • Account

      public Account(String handle)
      Constructs a new account instance with a pre-defined handle only

      Assumes the given handle has already been verified as unique by SocialMedia Account created will have a blank description string

      Parameters:
      handle - the handle to be used for the account

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      The method creates a string showing clearly the state of the attributes of the account class.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a String detailing account attributes.

    • setCount

      public static void setCount(int n)
      The method sets the account class's counter to the given n value, meaning future identifiers will be set as n+1, and so on

      Using n=0 is the same as reseting the counter as if no accounts exist Therefore you must be careful not to duplicate identifiers when using this method!

      Parameters:
      n - the number to start setting new identifers from

    • getIdentifier

      public int getIdentifier()
      The method gets the value of the private int identifier for the class.
      Returns:
      a int identifier for the account

      public String getHandle()
      The method gets the accounts handle.
      Returns:
      a String handle used to identify the account

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      The method gets the accounts description. Will return "" if no description has been set.
      Returns:
      a String description for the account

      public ArrayList<Post> getPosts()
      The method gets the value of the private int identifier for the class.

      a int identifier for the account

    • setHandle

      public void setHandle(String h)
      The method sets the account handle to the new String specified.

      Assumes the given handle is already unique, and has been checked beforehand by the SocialMedia class.

      Parameters:
      h - the new handle for the account

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String d)
      The method sets the account description to the new String specified.
      Parameters:
      d - the new description for the account

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(int id)
      The method removes the account's post that matches the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - the int identifier for the post that needs to be removed

    • createPost

      public Post createPost(String message)
      The method creates a new post associated with this account, given a message

      Assumes the given message is a valid String, that has already been checked against the requirements for a post

      Parameters:
      message - the String message to be used on the post
      Returns:
      the Post object that has just been created

    • createComment

      public Comment createComment(Post post, String message)
      The method creates a new comment associated with this account, given a message and original post to comment on

      Assumes the given message is a valid String, that has already been checked against the requirements for a post and that the given post is one which allows comments

      Parameters:
      post - a Post object representing the post that is being commented on
      message - the String message to be used on the comment
      Returns:
      the Comment object that has just been created

    • createEndorsement

      public Endorsement createEndorsement(Post post)
      The method creates a new endorsement associated with this account, given a post to endorse

      Assumes that the given post is valid and one which allows endorsements

      Parameters:
      post - a Post object representing the post that is being endorsed
      Returns:
      the Endorsement object that has just been created

    • getTotalEndorsments

      public int getTotalEndorsments()
      The method counts the total number of endorsements accociated with the account
      Returns:
      the int count of endorsements

    • getInfo

      public StringBuilder getInfo()
      The method returns the account information in a format ready to be displayed to the user
      Returns:
      the StringBuilder object containing the formatted information
